## Checklist

Before requesting review, please confirm:

- [ ] I copied the template folder (didn't edit `portfolios/template/` directly)
- [ ] I filled in all `[bracketed]` sections in my portfolio page
- [ ] I updated my card on the landing page (`index.html`)
- [ ] I tested my page at http://localhost:8000
- [ ] My links work (GitHub repo, back to team, etc.)
- [ ] My commit message is descriptive (e.g., "Add: Jordan portfolio page")
